channel.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PointsOfPresence on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PointsOfPresence on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PointsOfPresence
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PointsOfPresence Datatype Description SoftLayer’s CDN content delivery network offering replicates your data to a number of Points of Presence (POP’s) around the world. SoftLayer_Container_Network_ContentDelivery_PointsOfPresence models one of these POP locations. Local id A CDN Point of Presence's internal identifier. Type: integer name A CDN Point of Presence's name. This is typically the city that the POP is located in. Type: string
